quote: Working together with Linda has truly been a remarkable experience. Her exceptional talent, meticulous attention to detail, and unwavering determination make her a standout engineer.

During her tenure at ThisDot, we had the privilege of working together on a project that showcased Linda's proactive approach to process refinement. Her insights significantly contributed to the team's efficiency, leading to the successful meeting of crucial deadlines.

Linda's role as an incredibly thorough code reviewer stands out as a testament to her commitment to quality. Her insightful questions consistently provide fresh perspectives that elevate the overall standard of our work.
Linda's capacity to proactively plan for future challenges while maintaining a cool head during high-pressure situations is truly commendable.

She is a rather quick learner, and has a very efficient work ethic. Linda's approach to crafting high-quality code is characterized by meticulous testing (unit, integration and e2e level) and comprehensive documentation practices. I would really like to work together with Linda in the future. Don't miss out on her!
name: Balázs Tápai
